description: Collect detailed feedback from your customers to improve services and products.
name: Customer Feedback Form

steps.title: We Value Your Feedback!
steps.text: Your experience is important to us, and we are committed to continuously improving our products and services. We would greatly appreciate it if you could take a few moments to provide us with your valuable feedback. Your responses will help us understand what weâ€™re doing well and where we can make improvements.

blocks.label: Email Address
blocks.help: Please provide your email address for any follow-up communication.
blocks.name: email

blocks.label: Phone Number
blocks.help: Optional: Provide your phone number if you prefer to be contacted by phone.
blocks.name: phone

blocks.label: Overall Satisfaction
blocks.help: Rate your overall satisfaction with our product/service from 1 to 5 stars.
blocks.name: rating_overall

blocks.label: Quality of Product/Service
blocks.help: Rate the quality of the product or service you received from 1 to 5 stars.
blocks.name: rating_product

blocks.label: Customer Support Experience
blocks.help: Rate your experience with our customer support from 1 to 5 stars.
blocks.name: rating_customer_support

blocks.label: Likelihood to Recommend
blocks.help: How likely are you to recommend our product/service to others? (1 to 10)
blocks.name: rating_likelihood_to_recommend

blocks.label: Comments or Suggestions
blocks.help: Please provide any additional comments or suggestions.
blocks.name: comments
